entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronation 04:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -17

Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
